featured.text: Once the questions are finished, the examiner analyzes the results to determine if the person tested 24 truthful.
Well-trained examiners can usually detect lying with a high degree of 25 when they use a polygraph.

definition.zh_def: 考官；負責考試或評估的人。
definition.en_def: A person who conducts an examination or assessment.
definition.example: The examiner reviewed all the answers before grading the test.
